|brand = Edimax |model = Gemini RG21S |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 1.0 |subrevision = A |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 14, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_Gemini_RG21S |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NDD9568771606 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1244-01001054-50Z |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NOR<!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC64M16GP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |sw_cpu = <!-- true, --> |sw1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/08/2017 |estreldate = 04/13/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4717964701114 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0775D239W |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01001054-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC2600'' (800Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 1733Mbps [5 GHz]) * Antennas: 4x external high-gain antenna * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN * Vendor firmware features: MU-MIMO, Guest Network, :VPN server: OpenVPN Server *Vendor firmware operation modes: wireless router, access point
==Links of Interest== ===Agregation=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/edimax-rg21s-ac2600-mu-mimo-home-wi-fi-roaming-3871 On '''SpeedGuide'''] *[https://uk.hardware.info/product/394233/edimax-rg21s/specifications On '''HardWare.info''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/edimax/gemini-rg21s/ ''Edimax Gemini RG21S'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) :*CPU: [[MediaTek MT7621AT]] @880MHz Dual Core :*Flash: 16MB (NOR) Flash :*RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC64M16GP-DI (128MB DDR3) :*WLAN: 2x [[MediaTek]] MT7615N 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/edimax/edimax_gemini_rg21s |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/edimax/gemini_rg21s |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
